hard_logic_py:
result_list=[]
attraction_name_set=set()
for activity in allactivities(plan):
  if activity_type(activity)=='attraction': attraction_name_set.add(activity_position(activity))
result=({"观光夜市(威尼斯水城之夜)", "上海动物园", "徐家汇公园"}<=attraction_name_set)
result_list.append(result)
result=False
intercity_transport_go=''
intercity_transport_back=''
if allactivities(plan)[0]['type'] != "airplane" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[0])==start_city(plan) and allactivities(plan)[-1]['type'] != "train" and intercity_transport_origin(allactivities(plan)[-1])==target_city(plan):
  result=True
result_list.append(result)
result=False
for r in result_list:
  result=result or r
nature_language:
我们4人，从深圳出发，到上海旅行3天，要求满足以下任意一个：
1. 希望游览观光夜市(威尼斯水城之夜) 和 上海动物园 和 徐家汇公园
2. 不希望乘坐airplane前往目的地，不希望乘坐train返回
